lead_paragraph: The agent for Tampa Bay forward Jonathan Drouin says the third overall pick in the 2013 NHL draft has requested a trade from the Lightning.

headline.print_headline: Agent for Lightning's Drouin Says Young Forward Wants Trade
headline.main: Agent for Lightning's Drouin Says Young Forward Wants Trade
